from.title: From
from.description: Currency code this will be converted from.

to.title: To
to.description: Currency code this exchange rate will convert into.

at.title: At
at.description:
At represents the effective date and time at which the exchange rate
is determined by the source. The time may be zero if referring to a
specific day only.

source.title: Source
source.description:
Source key provides a reference to the source the exchange rate was
obtained from. Typically this will be determined by an application
used to update exchange rates automatically.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: How much is 1 of the "from" currency worth in the "to" currency.

ExchangeRate.description: ExchangeRate contains data on the rate to be used when converting amounts from one currency into another.
